events.heading: Introducing Our Events
events.intro: Welcome to the English Club! We are excited to announce upcoming events designed to enhance your skills, make new friends, and enjoy fun experiences. Check out our events below!
events.first_event_description: Join the first event of the English Club with fun and educational activities!
events.first_event_more_details: Detailed description of the first event.
events.second_event_description: Join the second event with interesting games and discussions!
